name: a11y-cypress-tests
description: Testes de acessibilidade com Cypress e cypress-axe

scripts.report:merge: rm -f cypress/reports/json/mochawesome.json && (ls cypress/reports/json/*.json && mochawesome-merge cypress/reports/json/*.json > cypress/reports/json/mochawesome.json || echo 'Nenhum arquivo JSON encontrado para mesclar')
scripts.report: npm run report:merge && npm run report:generate
